file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 55-22-00-04 - CONFIG-1 - SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This procedure gives the instructions to remove and install the spring-tab mass adjustment plates. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH spring tabs. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT 55-22-00-000-801-A EMB-145 PLATES - REMOVAL ACFT MODEL(S) SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT 55-22-00-400-801-A EMB-145 PLATES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 55-22-00 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-22-00-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the spring-tab mass adjustment plates. (2) Each spring tab has two mass adjustment plates: the inner and the outer mass adjustment plate. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-31-08-000-801-A/400 SPRING TAB - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 335 - LH Elevator 336 - RH Elevator D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-B (1) Put the workstand in the work area. (2) Remove the spring tab assembly (1) (AMM TASK 27-31-08-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 55-22-00 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-004-B (1) Remove the bolts (2), washers (3), and nuts (4). (2) Remove the steel plates (5). (3) Remove the spring-tab mass adjustment plates (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 55-22-00 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 Spring-Tab Mass Adjustment Plates - Removal/Installation Figure 401 1. SPRING TAB A ZONE 336 A ZONE 335 DET. A B (TYPICAL) 3. WASHERS C HINGE (SPRING TAB STRUCTURE) 3 4. NUTS C 5. STEEL PLATE 6. SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE 2. BOLTS DET. B 5. STEEL PLATE 6. SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE 1 SPRING-TAB 2 MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE DET. C DET. C 1 APPLICABLE TO AIRCRAFT 145001 TO 145014 2 APPLICABLE TO AIRCRAFT 145015 AND ON 3 TORQUE: 2.82 TO 3.4 N.m (25 TO 30 lb.in) 145AMM550025.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 55-22-00 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-22-00-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 3. SPRING-TAB MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the spring-tab mass adjustment plates. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-31-08-400-801-A/400 SPRING TAB - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 335 - LH Elevator 336 - RH Elevator D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To tighten the attachment nuts available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the work area I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-004-B (1) Install the spring-tab mass adjustment plates (6). (2) Install the steel plates (5). (3) Install the bolts (2), washers (3), and nuts (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 55-22-00 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Torque the nuts (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-B (1) Install the spring tab assembly (1) (AMM TASK 27-31-08-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 55-22-00 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
